it.unimi.di.law.warc.util

Class BoundSessionInputBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.impl.io.SessionInputBufferImpl
      • it.unimi.di.law.warc.util.BoundSessionInputBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BufferInfo, SessionInputBuffer

    public class BoundSessionInputBuffer
extends SessionInputBufferImpl
    A SessionInputBuffer implementation that bounds a SessionInputBuffer (and hence its buffered stream) so that no more than a specified amount of bytes will be read (from its stream), and keeps track of the number of read bytes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundSessionInputBuffer(SessionInputBuffer buffer, long length)
      Creates a new SessionInputBuffer bounded to a given maximum length.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void consume()
      Consumes the remaining bytes (of the buffered stream).
      long remaining()
      Returns the number of unread bytes (in the buffered stream).

        public BoundSessionInputBuffer(SessionInputBuffer buffer,
